summary: TAKATA RECALL    MANUFACTURE RECALL # G1P, NHTSA RECALL # 16V340    RECALL INITIATED MAY 23, 2016. DATE OF COMPLAINT JUNE 27, 2017. RECALL INCOMPLETE, REMEDY NOT YET AVAILABLE AFTER 1 YEAR AND 1 MONTH.     VEHICLE IS UNSAFE TO DRIVE WITH PASSENGER IN THE FRONT PASSENGER SEAT. RECALL IS TAKING TOO LONG, VEHICLE IS UNSAFE.
